Name: [Deployed] Devilboo
Desc: Active Skill: Enters the flying state, shooting homing bullets at enemies, dealing <color=#FE437E>Ether DMG</color> and accumulating <color=#FE437E>Ether Anomaly Buildup</color>.
Desc2: <color=#FFFFFF>Bangboo Chain Attack: Fires lasers at the target and then enters the coordination state. Under this state, fires homing bullets in coordination with the on-field character's attacks, dealing <color=#FE437E>Ether DMG</color> and accumulating <color=#FE437E>Ether Anomaly Buildup</color> for up to 30s or 10 activations.</color>
